entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
